p: Yield 70%, m.p. 135 °C. Analysis calculated C 18H 20FN 5; calcd.: % C 66.44; H, 6.20; N, 21.52; found: % C 66.49; H, 6.25; N, 21.548 IR: υ max./cm −1 3390 (NH), 3020 (C–H aromatic), 1595 (C═C). 13C NMR (DMSO-d 6): 152, 150, 147, 139, 138, 133, 130, 125, 124, 111, 54, 47, 45, 44. 1H NMR: δ 2.3 (s, 1H, NH, D 2O exchangeable), 2.7–3.2 (m, 8H, piperazinyl protons), 3.4 (dd, 1H, J = 11.2, 5.0 Hz, pyrazoline), 3.6 (dd, 1H, J= 11.6, 5.9 Hz, pyrazoline), 5.2 (dd, 1H, J= 12.0, 5.7 Hz, pyrazoline), 7.0–7.9 (m, 7H, Ar-H), and 8.8 (s, NH, D 2O exchangeable). MS: m/z (% relative intensity)=325 (M +, 19%), 229 (100%).
